title: Annapurna Circuit + Basecamp
description: Ranging from tropical forests and waterfalls along paddy fields to the frozen arctic region of the Tibetan plateau at %max%, the Annapurna Circuit + Basecamp thru-hike spanned %days% while winding its way around one of the eight tallest peaks in the world in the Himalayas of %location% over %distance%.
The sheer amount of total elevation gain and loss, changing biomes, and nearly succumbing to hypothermia, led to this being one of my toughest treks.
